articles.title: As DeSantis stumbles, anti-Trump Republicans fear a rerun in 2024 campaign - Reuters
articles.description: Current and former Republican Party operatives who have spent years trying to banish Donald Trump from American political life say the former president's 2024 campaign has begun to gain so much steam that they fear he is by far the favorite to become the part…
articles.content: April 21 (Reuters) - Current and former Republican Party operatives who have spent years trying to banish Donald Trump from American political life say the former president's 2024 campaign has begun … [+6766 chars]
